meanings.definition: The quality or state of being silvery.
meanings.sent1: The silverinesses of the moonlight shimmered on the lake.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the silverinesses of the metal in their painting.
meanings.sent3: The silverinesses of the fish scales made them look like tiny mirrors.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had a silverinesses that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The silverinesses of the clouds at sunset painted the sky in shades of silver and gold.

meanings.definition: The appearance or characteristic of resembling silver.
meanings.sent1: The silverinesses of the jewelry caught the sunlight and sparkled.
meanings.sent2: The car's paint had a sleek silverinesses that made it stand out.
meanings.sent3: The silverinesses of the new phone made it look futuristic and stylish.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes had a silverinesses that seemed to see right through you.
meanings.sent5: The silverinesses of the lake's surface reflected the clear blue sky above.
